synopsis.text: One day, in the tranquil village nestled within the smallest kingdom on the island of Clayborne, a girl named Nikola encounters a colossal dragon, a creature believed to dwell only in the deepest mountains. Just as the beast is about to wreak havoc, a mysterious man named Haga arrives, a member of the clandestine King's Seekers, an elite investigation team. Nikola, captivated by Haga's tales of adventure, decides to leave her mundane life behind to explore the world, unaware of the secrets she and Haga harbor, secrets that will alter their lives forever in this seemingly idyllic yet troubled realm.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
